syntax:
(* Call with mezzo -explain html *)

val _ =
  if explain true then begin
    let x = newref 0 in
    (x, x)
  end else begin
    (newref 0, newref 0)
  end

permissions:
[bool::q1 : perm, bool::q2 : perm, bool::p : perm, bool::s : perm, /root4 : term, b1 : term,
b2 : term]
(
  =/root4
| /root4 @
    (
      (
        (=b1 | b1 @ bool::rich_bool bool::q1 bool::p),
        (
          =b2
        | b2 @
            [/root5 : term]
            (=/root5 | /root5 @ (() | bool::s ∗ bool::q1)) ->
            (bool::rich_bool bool::q2 bool::p | /root5 @ (() | bool::s ∗ empty)))
      )
    | bool::s)) ->
(
  bool::rich_bool bool::q2 bool::p
| /root4 @
    (
      (
        unknown,
        (
          =b2
        | b2 @
            [/root5 : term]
            (=/root5 | /root5 @ (() | bool::s ∗ bool::q1)) ->
            (bool::rich_bool bool::q2 bool::p | /root5 @ (() | bool::s ∗ empty)))
      )
    | bool::s))

[/root22 : term, contents : term]
(=/root22 | /root22 @ (=contents | contents @ unknown)) ->
(Some { contents: =contents } | /root22 @ (=contents | contents @ unknown))

[bool::p : perm, bool::q : perm, /root1 : term]
(=/root1 | /root1 @ bool::rich_bool bool::p bool::q) ->
(bool::rich_bool bool::q bool::p | /root1 @ unknown)

[/root7 : term, x : term, y : term]
(=/root7 | /root7 @ ((=x | x @ unknown), (=y | y @ unknown))) ->
(bool::rich_bool empty x = y | /root7 @ ((=x | x @ unknown), (=y | y @ unknown)))

[bool::q : perm, bool::p1 : perm, bool::p2 : perm, bool::s : perm, /root2 : term, b1 : term,
b2 : term]
(
  =/root2
| /root2 @
    (
      (
        (=b1 | b1 @ bool::rich_bool bool::q bool::p1),
        (
          =b2
        | b2 @
            [/root3 : term]
            (=/root3 | /root3 @ (() | bool::s ∗ bool::p1)) ->
            (bool::rich_bool bool::q bool::p2 | /root3 @ (() | bool::s ∗ empty)))
      )
    | bool::s)) ->
(
  bool::rich_bool bool::q bool::p2
| /root2 @
    (
      (
        unknown,
        (
          =b2
        | b2 @
            [/root3 : term]
            (=/root3 | /root3 @ (() | bool::s ∗ bool::p1)) ->
            (bool::rich_bool bool::q bool::p2 | /root3 @ (() | bool::s ∗ empty)))
      )
    | bool::s))

[/root8 : term, x : term, y : term]
(=/root8 | /root8 @ ((=x | x @ unknown), (=y | y @ unknown))) ->
(bool::rich_bool x = y empty | /root8 @ ((=x | x @ unknown), (=y | y @ unknown)))

[bool::p : perm, bool::q : perm, /root6 : term, b : term]
(=/root6 | /root6 @ (=b | b @ bool::rich_bool bool::p bool::q)) ->
(bool::bool | /root6 @ (=b | b @ bool::rich_bool bool::p bool::q))

[ref::y1 : term, ref::y2 : term, /root26 : term, x : term]
(=/root26 | /root26 @ ((=x | x @ ref::ref =ref::y1), =ref::y2)) ->
((() | x @ ref::ref =ref::y2) | /root26 @ (unknown, =ref::y2))
